title: Math at Farmhill
text:
This section contains the approach to math teaching at farm hill, across grades starting from preschool to 12th grade.


At the very broad level, we expect the students to think like mathematicians when they do math. While we do focus on content, methods and techniques, we would really like them to see the patterns around them and make sense.

text: At the very broad level, we expect the students to think like mathematicians when they do math. While we do focus on content, methods and techniques, we would really like them to see the patterns around them and make sense.

title: Authoring Guide
text:
This section provides resoures and pointers on how to write and format content in this Quarto book.


Quarto uses Markdown for document syntax.
Markdown is a plain text format that is designed to be easy to write, and even more importantly, easy to read.
The refer to Markdown Basics in the Quarto Guide for how to format using Markdown.



Each qmd file in this repository gets rendered as a web page or an article.
The structure of a typical page look something like this.
# Page Title

This is a page about blah blah blah.

## Section 1

...

## Section 2

...
The page starts with the main heading with # prefix and the section headings start with prefix ##.
